subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: About one-third of major league pitchers have had the procedure to reconstruct the ulnar collateral ligaments in their elbows, and more and more are back for a second one.
snippet: About one-third of major league pitchers have had the procedure to reconstruct the ulnar collateral ligaments in their elbows, and more and more are back for a second one.
